controlled_vocabulary.comment: This table provides the restricted vocabulary for the type column in the table Contact and delimits the field in which contact information is being provided
The elements of this controlled vocabulary are encoded in the curation tool. They regulate the sub-setting of which contact entries are displayed in the scanner, software, and spotter screens.

term.name: sample_organism_provider
term.description: information is being provided about the source of the RNA or cDNA target used in the experiments

term.name: technology_spotter
term.description: information is being provided about the source of the spotter used to deposit DNA on the media

term.name: technology_array
term.description: information is being provided about the source of the array

term.name: technology_scanner
term.description: information is being provided about the source of the scanner used to collect the primary raw data

term.name: software_image_analysis
term.description: information is being provided about the source of the image analysis software used to provide primary data

term.name: software_scanner
term.description: information is being provided about the source of the scanner software

term.name: software_spotter
term.description: information is being provided about the source of the spotter software

term.name: clone_provider
term.description: information is being provided about the source of the nucleic acid deposited on the array

term.name: experiment_set_provider
term.description: information is being provided about the source of the experiment set.

term.name: curator
term.description: a curator on the GeneX project

term.name: developer
term.description: a developer on the GeneX project

term.name: test_user
term.description: a user testing the GeneX project
